Introduction
This topic contains general information on participation in CBRNE testing, including
background on CBRNE testing
establishing CBRNE test participation
CBRNE testing and toxic exposure risk activity (TERA)
action to take when the Veteran claims participation in CBRNE testing but does not claim a disability
, and
end product (EP) control procedures for claims based on CBRNE testing
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section A - Developing Claims Based on Participation in Chemical Biological Radiological Nuclear and Explosives (CBRNE) Testing
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section A
